channel.title: Temptress Remix Contest!
channel.description: Hey, what‚Äôs going on Bravado here. I‚Äôm starting a remix competition today and would love to hear remixes of my new track ‚ÄúTemptress‚Äù! I‚Äôll send the finished Auxy project in this post (which is the song). What you have to do is 1. Must be unique and very creative. 2. You can use any Tempo or Tonality. 3. Can be any genre. 4.Once done, send me a soundcloud link to it. I‚Äôll award a medal emoji to 1st:ü•áüèÜ, 2nd:ü•àand 3rd: ü•â on three people that did the best! The deadline for this is Next week on Friday 1st June, where I‚Äôll announce the winners! Good luck to all and can‚Äôt wait to hear these: https://app.auxy.co/projects/kuwfFqRBaISkzQHmfEFXLw== Update: Deadline: 8th-15th June

item.title: Temptress Remix Contest!
item.dc:creator: Kerfuffle
item.description:
ALRIGHT! So as the extension is up, Here is my submission!
It‚Äôs a bit raw and unmastered, which is something i plan to fix in the near future.
Thanks for giving me the chance to work with this really cool piece. I didn‚Äôt want to change to much of its original design, so i tried to keep it to its roots while giving it that Kerfuffle style. I even dug a bit back and saw you were looking for a collab for this awhile back, so i went through the liberty of trying to appease your dreams for this piece in the second drop (although, its raw so leads aren‚Äôt wonky enough and the kicks need compression for it to sound right).
Bravado - Temptress (Kerfuffle Remix)

Read full topic
